Content-type: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-1; format=flowed
Content-transfer-encoding: 7BIT

Why is the following selftests not a part of the standard execution of 
the selftest:

TrickyRelativeURIs
SpacesInHrefPath
SimpleJavascriptExtraction
RobotsExclusion
Refresh
FormTagExtraction
SimpleDocumentTypes

They are excluded from execution in the index.jsp file in the root of 
the webapp selftest !!
But they seem very relevant to execute in every selftest - especially on 
new versions of heritrix !!

best
Bjarne Andersen


--Boundary_(ID_sAlIHbFDiETWfpd9zX3GRA)
